recently_narrative:
1. The most significant operational pattern that administrators need to understand is the increasing reliance on AI-powered automation within the Zendesk ecosystem, which is causing stability issues and service disruptions across multiple product areas.

2. Zendesk administrators should carefully monitor the rollout and performance of AI-driven features, thoroughly test them in non-production environments, and be prepared to quickly troubleshoot and mitigate any resulting service incidents that may arise from the integration of these new AI capabilities.

release_notes.summary: Copilot ticket summarization now includes both public replies and internal notes, with an expanded word limit to capture more ticket context. Copilot's real-time AI suggestions for agents during live voice calls provide instant, context-aware recommendations from the help center to help resolve customer issues more efficiently.

article.title: Release notes through 2025-10-10
article.description:
See our What's New for an overview of what was released last month.This week's release notes include:
Copilot
Voice
App Marketplace
Products with no updates this week
